name: Santa Is Dead
description:
Santa is dead, and his magic hat is gone. You are appointed as a manager of the Christmas syndicate by the council. Retrieve Santa's hat as fast as possible and save Christmas!

Will you stop at anything, trying to do your job? What is a definition of a good person? Is their happiness worth more than the fate of an entire race?

Experience randomized strategy with:

- 13 different buildings.

- 12 different governmental decisions.

- 2 endings

Music by Steve Oxen
